src_original: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
pattīyasi /  yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi /
tgt_original: 如我稱揚彼世尊藥師琉璃光如來所有功德，汝信受耶？

src_original: atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vâtra gambhīre buddhagocare //
tgt_original: 汝於如是諸佛如來甚深境界多生疑惑。

src_original: na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrânteṣu /
tgt_original: 「大德世尊！ 我於如來所說法中，無復疑惑。
一切如來身口意行無不清淨。

src_original: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahânubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ /  sumeruḥ parvatarājā sthānāc calet /  na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet //
tgt_original: 世尊！ 此日月有如是大神通、有如是大威力，可令墮落，須彌山王可得移動，諸佛所言無有差異。

src_original: kiṃtu bhadanta bhagavan santi satvāḥ śraddhêndriyavikalā ye buddhagocaraṃ śrutvā na śraddadhati /  teṣām evaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 大德世尊！ 或有眾生信根不具，聞說如來佛境界已，作是思惟：

src_original: katham idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ smaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasyâittakā guṇânuśaṃsā bhavati /
tgt_original: 『云何但念彼如來名獲爾許功德？

src_original: te na śraddadhati /  na pattīyanti /  pratikṣipanti /  teṣāṃ dīrgharātram anarthāyâhitāyâsukhāya vinipātāya bhaviṣyati // bha-
tgt_original: 』心不信受，生於誹謗，此等長夜無義饒益，當墮苦趣。

src_original: asthānam ānandânavakāśo yeṣāṃ tasya nāmadheyaṃ nipatet karṇe teṣāṃ durgatyapāyagamanaṃ bhaved iti /
tgt_original: 「阿難！ 若彼如來所有名號入其耳中，此人墮惡道者，無有是處。
阿難！ 諸佛境界誠為難信，汝今信受，應知皆是如來威力，非一切聲聞、辟支佛地所能信受，唯除一生補處菩薩摩訶薩。
